content: {"locationId": "10720", "organizationId": "8381", "name": "East Mountain Food Pantry", "address1": "1342 NM 333 Suite B", "address2": "", "city": "Tijeras", "state": "NM", "zipCode": "87059", "country": null, "phone": "505-407-1078", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "35.091576", "longitude": "-106.2679365", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  East Mountains of Albuquerque", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "We are located on NM-333 (Route 66) near the intersection of Mountain Valley Road.  We have parking in front of our building in spots marked with our logos.  Pantry volunteers will come to vehicles in the parking lot to initiate a visit during food distribution hours. ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Dietary Menu Options, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 71, "regionName": "Roadrunner Food Bank of New Mexico", "logoBlobNameSmall": "d2c42119-4ccf-487d-89a3-a39cf3f3228b.png", "website": "https://www.rrfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": ["Monday 2:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Wednesday 1:00 PM-5:00 PM", "Thursday 12:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Saturday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
